DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study : Evaluation affect dose rate UVR induce skin erythema . Study design : A single-center , prospective , randomize , crossover , open study . Number patient : 20-40 Patient population : Healthy volunteer Control : Different sit patient body Procedure duration : Total 3-5 hour ( 4 visit ) Duration follow : 4 day Duration study : Up 6 month Primary objective : To examine difference erythemal response function dose rate , ass total amount energy theoretically transmit sunscreen within range SPF 2-10 .
DOC.brief_title: Affect Dose Rate UVR Induced Skin Erythema
DOC.criteria: Fitzpatrick Skin type IIII . Age 1860 . Absence obvious sun damage volar side forearm exposure sit . Absence exposure arm exposure sit sunlight two week prior experiment .
